content:
Hello all,

Weird question. Let's say I want to compile for an AVX2 target, is there a way on Windows to be able to check that AVX2 is enabled at runtime? I don't need it to do anything fancy with that info, panicking would be acceptable at the start but less so in the middle of execution. (i.e. I'd like to move any potential problems to before it does the complicated bit.
